item.title: Troubleshooting SAML Auth on FortiClient VPN when applying NCSC Baselines
item.description: Dearest gentle reader… (Yes, my wife is making me watch that Bridgerton series on netflix, so I may speak like a 19th century gentlemen during this blog post… or not…) I recently blogged about the implementation of Center for Information Security (CIS) and how those configurations broke Windows Autopilot. It then developed into a series on CIS with another gentleman of the manor, Nick Benton. And so, speaking of security posture, I recently undertook a customer engagement that wanted to modernise their Windows Management and explore Entra joined only devices using Autopilot, but also, to align all their security configuration to National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) - which of course I did but in doing so this broke their SAML authentication on Forticlient VPN - so here’s the story of how I fixed it.
